p: Next, we evaluated whether MAYV infection could induce specific anti-MAYV responses. Figure 1i revealed that IgM levels were elevated at day 7 post-MAYV inoculation and then returned to baseline levels (Fig. 1I- black square) while IgG levels started to increase at day 7 reaching a peak at day 14 and remained elevated until day 49 (last time point analyzed) (Fig. 1i – white square).
